extracted_playbook.title: Update to Fixed Firmware Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the device firmware to FWA-INDRV-MP-20V36 to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is a device update possible and feasible?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Compensatory Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Define and implement compensatory measures individually in the context of the operational environment, as described in the 'Security Manual Electric Drives and Controls'.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Security Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for control system devices, locate them behind firewalls, and use VPNs for remote access.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed on the CISA ICS webpage.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited emails. Refer to CISA guidelines on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
